name: Unown A
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Anger]
abilities.effect: Whenever 1 of your Pokémon with Unown in its name uses its Hidden Power attack, that attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on Unown A. If you have more than 1 Unown A in play, use only 1 [Anger] for each attack.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
